MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn, affecting properties in Holmes Holdings and the surrounding area. We are aware you have been affected by a grounded conductor earlier and we apologise for this. Our engineers have now also discovered further broken overhead line equipment at Holmes Holding upon further investigations, and will now work to carry out repairs as quickly and as safely as possible to restore all supplies by 3PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.15PM on 20 February 2021.
